content: **knitted pot holder in drops paris the piece is worked bottom up with santas bobbles and snowflakes theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #snowyclauspotholders drops design pattern w-941 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 17 x 17 cm **yarn** 1 pot holder drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50 g colour 68 almond 50 g colour 17 off white 50 g colour 37 bordeaux 2 pot holders drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g colour 68 almond 50 g colour 17 off white 50 g colour 37 bordeaux 1 pot holder weighs approx 56 g **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
